title: Strengthening of the coordination of emergency humanitarian assistance of the United Nations
text:
United Nations 
A/80/L.30
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
8 December 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-20150 (E)    091225     
*2520150* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Agenda item 72 (a) 
Strengthening of the coordination of humanitarian 
and disaster relief assistance of the United Nations, 
including special economic assistance: strengthening 
of the coordination of emergency humanitarian 
assistance of the United Nations 
 
 
 
United States of America:* amendment to draft resolution A/80/L.25 
 
 
Strengthening of the coordination of emergency humanitarian 
assistance of the United Nations  
 
 
1. 
In the fourth preambular paragraph, delete “and expressing deep concern about 
the impact of climate change,”. 
2. 
In the fifteenth preambular paragraph, delete “including those related to the 
continuing impact of climate change,”. 
3. 
Delete the sixteenth preambular paragraph. 
4. 
Delete the twentieth preambular paragraph. 
5. 
Delete the twenty-third preambular paragraph. 
6. 
In the forty-first preambular paragraph, delete “including in the face of the 
ongoing consequences and long-term effects of the coronavirus disease 
(COVID-19) pandemic, disasters caused by natural and human-made hazards, 
the adverse effects of climate change and armed conflicts,”. 
7. 
In operative paragraph 21, delete “of considering the impact of climate 
change”. 
8. 
Delete operative paragraph 22. 
9. 
In operative paragraph 24, delete “those driven by natural climate cycles and 
those exacerbated by the adverse effects of climate change,”. 
10. In operative paragraph 33, delete “climate adaptation and mitigation,”. 
11. 
In operative paragraph 39, delete “some of which are exacerbated by the 
adverse effects of climate change,”. 
 
 
 
* Any changes to the list of sponsors will be reflected in the official record of the meeting.

paragraphs.1: In the fourth preambular paragraph, delete “and expressing deep concern about the impact of climate change,”.
paragraphs.2: In the fifteenth preambular paragraph, delete “including those related to the continuing impact of climate change,”.
paragraphs.6: In the forty-first preambular paragraph, delete “including in the face of the ongoing consequences and long-term effects of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic, disasters caused by natural and human-made hazards, the adverse effects of climate change and armed conflicts,”.
paragraphs.7: In operative paragraph 21, delete “of considering the impact of climate change”.
paragraphs.9: In operative paragraph 24, delete “those driven by natural climate cycles and those exacerbated by the adverse effects of climate change,”.
paragraphs.10: In operative paragraph 33, delete “climate adaptation and mitigation,”.
paragraphs.11: In operative paragraph 39, delete “some of which are exacerbated by the adverse effects of climate change,”. * Any changes to the list of sponsors will be reflected in the official record of the meeting.
